paper_abstract: We present an application of a novel Variational Wave Acquisition Stereo System (VWASS) for the estimation of the wave surface height of oceanic sea states. Specifically, we show that VWASS video technology combined with statistical techniques based on Euler Characteristics of random fields provides a new paradigm for the prediction of wave extremes expected over a given area of the ocean. (C) 2011 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Euler characteristics of oceanic sea states
